add_subdirectory(../cyclone_common ../cyclone_common)

add_library(cycloneCRYPTO STATIC
	cipher_modes/ecb.c
	kdf/hkdf.c
	mac/hmac.c
	aead/gcm.c
	hash/sha256.c
	cipher/aes.c


	# cipher_modes/cfb.c
	# cipher_modes/xts.c
	# cipher_modes/ctr.c
	# cipher_modes/ofb.c
	# cipher_modes/cbc.c
	# pkix/pem_export.c

)

target_include_directories(cycloneCRYPTO PUBLIC ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/deps/cyclone_common ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/deps/cyclone_config ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/deps/cyclone_crypto)
target_link_libraries(cycloneCRYPTO PUBLIC cycloneCommon)
